title: AI in Radiology: Cautious Adoption Trends
summary: A moderately supported review of AI-assisted radiology tools, mixing verified studies with model inference.

EVID.rationale: Mix of cited papers and model inference.

claims.text: A 2023 NEJM study found AI flagged 94% of critical findings.
Hospital adoption grew 38% YoY across 12 US states.
Radiologist overtime fell by 15% at pilot sites.
FDA cleared three new AI radiology devices in Q1 2024.
Liability insurance costs dropped at AI-adopting hospitals.
